subject: Productivity
title: Goal Stacking and Hierarchies
description: A 60-second lesson on Goal Stacking and Hierarchies.

hook.text: Your daily task connects to a weekly goal, which connects to a yearly mission. That's a goal hierarchy.

buildup.text: Goal hierarchies link small actions to big purposes. Each level answers: why does this matter?

discovery.text: When every task connects upward to meaning, motivation stays alive. Disconnected tasks feel pointless.

twist.text: Most people set goals at one level only. They miss the power of connecting daily actions to lifetime vision.

climax.text: The hierarchy works both ways. Top-down for planning. Bottom-up for execution.

punchline.text: Connect today's task to tomorrow's purpose. That's where motivation lives.

quiz.question: What do goal hierarchies connect?
options: Small daily actions to bigger long-term purposes
Only short-term tasks to each other
